text: @johncardillo Umm, if your point is #HermanCain had the freedom to greatly increase his chance of #COVID19 and fatal respiratory failure by atttending the #trump Tulsa rally w/out wearing a mask, then yeah. The #GOPDeathCult shire has a funny way of doing “freedom”
